captions.text:
Hi, my name is Erhard Lettner.
This is my truck. Welcome!

I bought this truck since it's
the most powerful one on the market

and since it's the only truck
that looks like this.

Many things on the truck
are customized.

Customized, customized,
customized, customized...

Customized, customized, customized,
customized, customized...
That's original.

It's important for me
to have a unique truck
since I like pretty things

and driving for fourteen hours a day
is more fun in a good-looking truck
than in one straight out of the factory.
In the ceiling of the driver's cabin

we've put in leather upholstery
with LEDs.
The doors also have leather upholstery.

The transmission tunnel cover
and the floor mats are customized, too.

The truck is purple because we
absolutely didn't want a white one.
We didn't know what colour to pick,

so we just closed our eyes and pointed
at a colour chart. And purple it was.

The costliest things on the exterior
are the exhaust system and the bull bar.
What's special about the exhaust system

is the fact that the exhausts
go upwards instead of downwards
and that the pipes are stainless steel.

The elks in the airbrush design
are a remnant from the old days,

when we used to drive to Scandinavia.
The elk is the company logo.
To sum up, this is a really special truck.

That's all from me. Now I have to return
to work. I'll see you on the Autobahn!

title: Volvo Trucks - Entirely customised FH16 750 from Austria - "Welcome to my cab"
